resources.string:
This will let XClipper to monitor clipboard & will able to capture some of known strategies if system detects any copy/cut action.


This feature is still in BETA for Android 10+ users and may not work always.

Some items are dependent on this tag
Make sure it is turned on to detect clipboard changes (require accessibility service)
Define language for finding definition of word (usually seen in special actions)
Enable uploading of device data to the database
Remove all connection with the database
Initialize a connection to an online database for cross platform syncing
Are you sure you want to log out?

In order to monitor clipboard you need to enable the accessibility service from settings.

1. Click OK to open accessibility settings.
2. Click on Installed Services (Samsung).
3. Search for XClipper.
4. Click and enable it.

You need to enable System overlay permission.

1. Click OK to open Display Overlay settings.
2. Enable "Allow display over other apps".
You can synchronize your clipboard data between this device & a desktop companion app. Click on \"Learn more\" to know about it.
Attempting to make a connection with database…
Sometimes you might\'ve to restart the app for theme to get applied properly.
Retrieve all the data from an exported local database
You need to restart the app in order to apply changes!
Apps in which clipboard capturing is disabled
[BETA] Show a small bubble whenever keyboard pops out containing your latest clips

XClipper monitors your clipboard and makes an extensive use of it.


It also provide certain actions according to the data.


With suggestion overlay, you can easily paste from multiple clipboards.

Accessibility,


You need to turn on "accessibility" service for this app.


This is due to a restriction imposed by Google which does not allow long running background tasks.


This service will keep running in background capturing your clipboard data.

Suggestions [BETA],


Get a small bubble whenever keyboard pops out containing all your clips.


Enable it from App Settings > General > Suggestions.

Android 10+ user,


Sometimes standard copy doesn't work, in such case use "XCopy".

Android 10+ user,


Sometimes copy action is not detected, in such case use quick setting option.

Synchronization,


The application works best with it's Windows desktop app.


It allows you to synchronize clipboard data across devices.


Visit https://kaustubhpatange.github.io/XClipper/docs for more info.

Wrapping up,


Watch video to understand full feature usage of application.


https://youtube.com

Android 10+ user,


Due to new introduced privacy changes clipboard monitoring has stopped working from Android 10.


Find more info about this issue on issue tracker https://issuetracker.google.com/issues/123461156


But through some hacks (not perfect one) we can enable it using an accessibility service.


This feature is still in BETA!
Want to give feedback or a quick chat just hit me up
Copy text or click to create a new empty paste

Sometimes logout doesn\'t succeed as expected. Use this to forcefully remove the credentials

Swiping item to right will delete it permanently

This may result into unexpected deletion of clips if your remote database has restriction on item limit.
This will trim whitespaces from the clip data while displaying.

And it has been reported to my server. So you don\'t need to perform any additional step.
This will stop the clipboard monitoring functionality.
XClipper can show you suggestions based on the last word from a search query.
